taskGroup.name: Develop OpenClovis model
taskGroup.intro: Welcome to OpenClovis model development tutorial. This guide will walk you through the process of creating a new model, configuring HA, performing manageability, generate ASP ready model application source, build source, create images and deploy it to target machine. To assist you along the way, wizards and commands will be available for you to launch automatically.

task.name: Create model
task.intro: This guide will walk you through the process of setting up OpenClovis environment, creating a new model and getting familiar with the OpenClovis IDE.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a model!

task.name: Configure HA (High Availability)
task.intro: This guide will walk you through the process of configuring components, associating resources for components and configuring AMF.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just configured HA for the model!

task.name: Perform manageability
task.intro: This guide will walk you through the process of importing mibs, modeling resources, configuring alarms and associating resources for components.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just performed manageability for the model!

task.name: Build and deploy
task.intro: This guide will walk you through the process of generating source code, customizing generated code, build, creating image, deploying image and running ASP.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just built and deployed the model!
